## Endpoints

### Embeddings
Endpoints to calculate embeddings for protein sequences.

## /api/v1/

```{=html}
<script src="https://unpkg.com/swagger-ui-dist@5.1/swagger-ui-bundle.js"></script>
<script>
  
  window.onload = function() {
    const ui = SwaggerUIBundle({
      url: "https://dev.api.openprotein.ai/api/v1/embeddings/swagger/doc.json",
      dom_id: "#swagger-ui",
      config: {
        deepLinking: true,
        tagsSorter: "alpha",
        docExpansion: "list",
      },
      requestInterceptor: (request) => {
          const requestPath = request.url.split('/').slice(3).join('/')
          request.url = "https://dev.api.openprotein.ai/" + requestPath
       
        return request;
      },
    });
  };
</script>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/swagger-ui.css">
<div id="swagger-ui"></div>
```
